2.name: dispose
2.type: Destroys an element’s button. (Removes stored data on the DOM element)

3.name: getInstance
3.type: Static method which allows you to get the button instance associated with a DOM element, you can use it like this: bootstrap.Button.getInstance(element).

4.name: getOrCreateInstance
4.type: Static method which returns a button instance associated with a DOM element or creates a new one in case it wasn’t initialized. You can use it like this: bootstrap.Button.getOrCreateInstance(element).

5.name: toggle
5.type: Toggles push state. Gives the button the appearance that it has been activated.
